sg.edu.smu.ecology.connector

Interface Connector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseConnector, BluetoothClientConnector, BluetoothServerConnector

    public interface Connector
    Created by Quentin ROY on 17/6/16.

    Main interface for connectors. Connector abstracts the way a message can be sent to other devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
